text: Onoosanyukiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo ky’anaabanga yeerondedde okubeerangamu Erinnya lye. Onoosanyukanga ne batabani bo, ne bawala bo, n’abaweereza bo abasajja, n’abaweereza bo abakazi, n’Omuleevi anaabeeranga mu bibuga byo, ne munnaggwanga ne mulekwa, ne nnamwandu abanaabeeranga mu mmwe.
